transcript:
Customer: Haan, hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Yeah, hi Mohit sir, very good evening.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uh sir, main Amit baat kar raha tha Ayushi ke senior manager India Mart office Noida se. Haan. Sir aapka ek feedback hamare paas receive hui hai sir, main jaanna chahunga kahin koi dikkat aa rahi sir?
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Hello. Sir main India Mart head office Noida se baat kar raha hun. Aapki side se ek feedback hame receive hui hai sir whatsapp ke through. To main jaanna chahunga sir unka baat hui thi aapke secondary number pe, hai na sir? Haan. Ke jo brother hai sir, hai na unse unki baat hui hai. To aapke paas ek feedback gaya tha to unhone proper aapki profile ko lekar kaise users karna hai har cheez unhone aapko bataya hai unko, theek hai sir? To wo feedback sir aapne not satisfied kar diya tha to main jaanna chahunga kaise help kar sakte hain hum aapki batayenge sir please.
Customer: Koi issue hai sir aapko Ayushi se?
Executive: Abhi to unse baat hui thi.
Customer: Haan haan to main wohi keh raha hun sir aapne feedback diya na unke khilaf. Non satisfied karke. To isliye main aapse puch raha hun sir ko kya dikkat aa rahi ek baar aap mujhe batayenge? Nahi koi dikkat nahi. Kyunki wo aapko to aapko coordinate kar rahe hain na sir koi issue to nahi hai na sir?
Executive: Ji. To theek hai sir main ye aapka jo feedback hai aapka jo not satisfied kiya usko close kar doon na sir? 
Customer: Theek kar do.
Executive: Haan to uske khilaf mein na sir aapke paas na ek mail pe aapke paas feedback jayega to please aap satisfied kar dijiyega sir. Theek.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Thank you so much sir main baki ye cheeze jo hai sir aapko close kar deta hun. Aapke paas feedback aayega please satisfied kar dijiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked feedback as not satisfied.

Resolution:

- Executive offered assistance to resolve issues.

- Executive will close the feedback.

- Customer agreed to satisfy the feedback form.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, satisfaction, profile
